name: apple_eating_branching
description: Eating an apple with multiple preparation and consumption methods

states.description: Empty white table with only a red apple sitting in the center
The red apple has been sliced in half, showing the white flesh and seeds inside. A knife is visible next to the apple halves
The apple has a large bite taken out of it, showing teeth marks on one side. The apple is still whole otherwise
The apple slices have been eaten, leaving only the apple cores and knife on the table
One apple half has been placed in a transparent container. The other half and knife remain on the table
The apple has multiple bite marks and only the core remains visible. Apple pieces are scattered on the table
The bitten apple has been cut into slices around the bite mark. Knife and irregular apple pieces on table
The container with one apple half is on the table. The other half has been eaten, leaving only the core and knife

actions.description: Cut the apple in half with a knife, exposing the inside
Take a large bite directly from the apple
Eat the apple slices, leaving only the cores
Place one apple half in a transparent container
Continue biting the apple multiple times until only the core remains
Use the knife to slice the bitten apple into pieces
